title: how is this possible???????????
body:
im in a very deep shock riot. i was not being aggressive with chat at all due to 2week ban from 2months ago. i have now keeping my chat very low. heres the chat got me banned please take a review again. im deeply confused. 
game 1 rakan flamed me very badly along with mid laner.. rakan told me to hang my self. i legit didnt say anything back. all i did was said it in all chat he should be reported for what he said, i also d/ced for 20sec game 1 due to internet problem they flamed me hard afterwards aswell i tryed my best to keep my cool. please take a review on my game. if theres a misunderstanding. again game 2 i got flamed all game long i tryed my best to keep my cool i have no idea why did that trigger chat system. game 3 i got a lucain flamed me all game long. wont leave me alone i muted him he wont stop spam pinging me and i muted his pings also afterwards. and game 3 i also got flamed by whole team after i muted all chat they wont stop spam ping me. please riot take a review i do not deserve to be banned i .

replies.body:
sorry, but it's well deserved. 

Your passive agressive behaviour deserved you a punishment.

And it happens that the next punishment was a permaban because of your previous behaviour. You didnt learn to be respectful and cold minded, so riot tells you they dont want you in their game anymore.

is everyone here trying to be funny?
in the first game he said "ff its like 0% winable" and he called his rakan 12 year old
game 2 again "ff 15" 
game 3 i dont even care to read
game 1 and 2 he also has this OBVIOUS sarcastic tone like "yea is my fault. you not doing this and you doing that all my fault".

this guy is toxic as fuck.

seriously? yes it is a permaban because he even said he had a 14day ban. yea 2 months ago or so, but if he kept this behavior up, he never improved in his behavior.
is everyone in this thread totally new to the system? 
seriously wtf is going on, did i enter a parallel universe where being a sarcastic asshole who wants to surrender right away is now positive behavior?

>is everyone here trying to be funny?

i don't think im trying

i think im succeding

One of two things are gonna happen
1: The more likely one - Riot tantram is gonna come in here and tell us the full story and {{summoner:11}} you
Or
2: The unlikely one - Riot tantram sees these and realizes there was a mistake and "maybe" reduced penalty.

> [{quoted}](name=CrazFight ,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=usw6pWMH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-31T04:02:40.191+0000)

Riot admitting a fuck up?

Lemme inhale real quick for my upcoming overly exaggerated laugh. 

HAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!
Riot has reduced (and extended) penalties on the forums in the past, as well as through support tickets.
I was expecting a fake laugh like Tidus and Yuna does in FFX. Disappointed. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

the probability of tantram seeing this particular post and commenting on it are about as high as  me getting an expensive champion shard in my next champion capsule

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Last I checked (I've been away from League for about a year and just came back), "report calling" (asking teammates/opponents to report someone) is against the rules. If someone does something that violates the rules, just report them yourself and move on - it's not the amount of reports per game that ends up determining whether or not a a player gets punished (or perhaps considered for punishment, not sure which), but rather the number of games they get reported _in_.

Personally I would consider your attitude in your log to be annoying (that's quite a lot of chatting for one game, by the way), but not permaban-worthy. You're a bit passive-aggressive with your teammates. However, perhaps you were punished because of the report calling - if you weren't aware of that being against the rules before, you are now, so if you get your punishment reduced, I'd make that the first thing you avoid in the future.

Here's the deal.
First of all:
Don't
type
like
this.
it's
very 
annoying
and
unpleasant 
to 
read.

Just write full sentences before you hit enter, in ingame chat.

Secondly, what I could see that got you banned, is the fact that you repeated the phrase "Hang my self". It's probably a trigger phrase for the IFS, just like "kys". 

Thirdly, you were toxic. In the end you wrote:

Pharaohs: report
Pharaohs: lucain
Pharaohs: pls
Pharaohs: he just went in
Pharaohs: 1v1
Pharaohs: j4
Pharaohs: report toxic lucain

Calling out someone and asking others to report him is considered griefing and displays toxic behavior.
And especially since you just had a 2-week ban, you should know better than that. You're clearly no innocent soul, since the 2 week ban doesn't come from nowhere. 
Why ask others to report? What do you gain from that other than spread toxicity? Does it change anything game related if 1 or 9 people report someone? No, absolutely not.

rather
choose
to

?
Their ability to mute does not excuse your toxicity.

What does that have to do with your team?
They flamed you, so what? Report them and they will be dealt with.
Doesn't change your attitude and your report case.

But when I look through your comments here on the board, I can already see why you got banned. You have a tendency to be passive aggressive, to flame other people, and in general to show toxic behavior. I'm not surprised you didn't change after your 2 week ban, and now I have to say I'm very glad you are permabanned. Getting rid of people like you from the rift improves the overall quality and gameplay experience of the game for the rest of us, who know how to behave.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
you must be a very lovely dog owner, behave very well just like a sheep in a failed system im glad i got perm banned too. :)

> [{quoted}](name=Pharaohs,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=usw6pWMH,comment-id=000c000000010000,timestamp=2018-02-01T05:11:31.001+0000)
>
> you must be a very lovely dog owner, behave very well just like a sheep in a failed system im glad i got perm banned too. :)

If it takes a permaban to make you not play a game you supposedly don't even enjoy playing, shows the amount of self control you have.
Has nothing to do with being a sheep in a herd. I'm a casual player, I barely got to Gold and I probably won't climb higher than that - ever. But for the time I spend on this game, I get enjoyment, and not bitterness like you. Let that sink in.
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

i mean like i said i just got off from 2 week ban 2 months ago so im keeping it very positive as possible. however, this still happend im just confused is typing in general consider as negative, because everyone have different meaning of negativity.

maybe don't try to point out everything your team does wrong in a super passive-aggressive and negative way...
and then argue about a play far after it's done and over with.

why would you waste time arguing whether darius should have 2v2'd after the fact?
why personally insult someone by mocking the age you assume they are?
why continue to be super sarcastic and rude af instead of just muting your teammates?

oh right. because you're toxic. this is toxic behavior. this isn't "trying to keep it positive after a 2 week ban" at all.

this isn't subjective. this isn't "everyone has a different meaning for negativity". **this is rude**. period. and if you behaved like this toward strangers face-to-face you would easily be cast out, ignored, or punched in the face for being a dick. 

it shouldn't be surprising to you that after you go out of your way to insult and annoy your team that they would report you. 

***you should have been doing everything you possibly could to avoid getting reported after a 2 week ban*** (which btw, literally only consists of keeping your mouth shut. all you had to do was stfu and stay silent instead of berating your team or responding to things you didn't like in chat), but you gave your teammates reason after reason to report you for your negativity.

Was this a perma-ban? I *could* see you maybe getting a chat restriction for this, if it was a constant game after game. And if it was your 4th ban, you'd auto get a perma, even for a chat restriction.

>I could see you maybe getting a chat restriction for this,

if this is worthy of a chat restrict then the permaban is justified since his previous punishment was a two week ban

contrary to missinformed popular belief, punishments are related to each other. your current punsihment is based both on wether you've had previous punishments and on toxicity. it's never **just** the toxicity
Don't think you read the rest of what I said man.
i did. i was just upgrading it
For some reason when I read the title I expected Big ghetti star memes. But then I noticed it was player behavior. My condolences m8.
Was it a permaban?
yes it was

> [{quoted}](name=Pharaohs,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=usw6pWMH,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-01-31T04:31:48.393+0000)
>
> yes it was

I suggest submitting a support ticket, and speaking with a Riot Rep.
Nothing we can do here.
You need to shut up in your games, you alone type more than a full premade.

Are you really questioning this ban? I'd mute you right away and report you the same way they did. You're taunting and being absolutely one of the most annoying type of person in the game. 

I'm sorry; I'm not hating. You deserve this ban. The people who reported you had a right to report you since they did not like the way you talked. I mean reread it and see for yourself. You're starting fights with other people. They have a right to report you. I'd report you too.

Time for you to reform and learn not to be toxic. It's not always about "Bad words"; it's about your attitude.

Looks like you're being passive aggressive at your team, you say "muted" twice. Which is toxic btw because you're trying to make the player you're muting pissed by saying that.
It would seem you're trying to stay positive more than your words are coming off as. Idk if that counts as toxic tbh. not enough for 2 week ban.

I tell people when I mute them just to make them realize that I cant see their toxicity anymore and half the time i dont actually mute, they just stop.  Ive had moments of uber tilt where I get muted and I realize I was tiliting and I stay out of chat to avoid tilting my team.

Honestly, I dont see too much issue here.  You say GG a few times too many, also you are WAY too active in the chat.  Yeah you did the right thing in muting your toxic teammates, but dont egg it on with other teammates.  Buuuut we are all only human, Ive done that before as well when someone gets over the top insane toxic.
i really dont think this is worthy of a ban, maybe a chat restriction. The system is stupid and Riot is soft. Im switching to Dota
{{sticker:katarina-love}}
Really not ban worthy.

for you all who ever say this is passive aggressive. first of all we are all humans we have emotions,however if 1person flames you and u told them you muted them and the whole team flame u after, is almost impossible to play even you muted the whole team, they wont stop spam ping you. so after you mute the're pings is almost impossible to play around the map. also what is passive aggressive??? replying in a conversation in general is being passive aggressive? anyways is just a perspective of how different people look at different things.
Banning system is actually trash , I see people wishing death to other's families and others gets banned for stupid rasons
